dimensions List array dimensions.

refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: The argument named_array must be an array that was previously created and stored in the SciDB namespace.

informalexample.para:
This example creates an array with one integer dimension and one string-type dimension:
AFL% CREATE ARRAY array1 <val:double>[row=0:2000,10,0,column=1:10,10,0]; AFL% dimensions(array1); {No} name,start,length,chunk_interval,chunk_overlap,low,high,type {0} 'row',0,2001,10,0,4611686018427387903,-4611686018427387903,'int64' {1} 'column',1,10,10,0,4611686018427387903,-4611686018427387903,'int64'
